GridGain™ 4.0.3c

Uses of Package
org.gridgain.grid

Packages that use org.gridgain.grid
org.gridgain.grid  Start Here  Contains main In-Memory Compute Grid APIs. 
org.gridgain.grid.cache  Start Here  Contains main In-Memory Data Grid APIs. 
org.gridgain.grid.cache.affinity Contains cache node affinity implementations. 
org.gridgain.grid.cache.affinity.partitioned Contains cache affinity for partitioned cache. 
org.gridgain.grid.cache.affinity.replicated Contains cache affinity for replicated cache. 
org.gridgain.grid.cache.cloner Contains cache cloner implementations. 
org.gridgain.grid.cache.datastructures Contains distributed data structures that work on top of data grid. 
org.gridgain.grid.cache.jta Contains JTA (Java Transaction API) related public classes and interfaces. 
org.gridgain.grid.cache.jta.jndi Contains JNDI-based transaction manager lookup. 
org.gridgain.grid.cache.jta.reflect Contains reflection-based transaction manager lookup. 
org.gridgain.grid.cache.query Contains query related public classes and interfaces. 
org.gridgain.grid.cache.store Contains cache store interfaces. 
org.gridgain.grid.cache.store.hbase   
org.gridgain.grid.cache.store.hibernate Contains reference Hibernate-based cache store implementation. 
org.gridgain.grid.cache.store.jdbc Contains reference JDBC-based cache store implementation. 
org.gridgain.grid.editions Contains annotations for types that are available in Enterprise edition only. 
org.gridgain.grid.events Contains various events emitted by GridGain. 
org.gridgain.grid.gridify Contains APIs utilized for AOP-based grid-enabling. 
org.gridgain.grid.lang Contains general language constructs and functional APIs. 
org.gridgain.grid.logger Contains logging functionality used throughout the system. 
org.gridgain.grid.logger.java Contains Java logging implementation for logging. 
org.gridgain.grid.logger.jboss Contains JBoss implementation for logging. 
org.gridgain.grid.logger.jcl Contains Jakarta commons logging implementation for logging. 
org.gridgain.grid.logger.log4j Contains Log4j implementation for logging. 
org.gridgain.grid.logger.slf4j Contains SLF4J implementation for logging. 
org.gridgain.grid.logger.tomcat Contains Tomcat implementation for logging. 
org.gridgain.grid.marshaller Contains marshalling functionality used throughout the system. 
org.gridgain.grid.marshaller.jboss Contains JBoss Serialization based marshaller. 
org.gridgain.grid.marshaller.jdk Contains JDK java.io based marshaller. 
org.gridgain.grid.marshaller.optimized Contains default Optimized marshaller. 
org.gridgain.grid.marshaller.xstream Contains XStream (http://xstream.codehaus.org/) based marshaller. 
org.gridgain.grid.spi Contains common classes and interfaces for SPI implementations. 
org.gridgain.grid.spi.collision Contains APIs for collision SPI. 
org.gridgain.grid.spi.communication Contains APIs for grid communication SPI. 
org.gridgain.grid.spi.communication.tcp Contains default TCP/IP-based implementation for communication SPI. 
org.gridgain.grid.spi.discovery Contains APIs for topology manager SPI. 
org.gridgain.grid.spi.discovery.multicast Contains default IP-multicast implementation for discovery SPI. 
org.gridgain.grid.spi.discovery.tcp Contains TCP/IP implementation for discovery SPI. 
org.gridgain.grid.spi.discovery.tcp.metricsstore Contains metrics store interface. 
org.gridgain.grid.spi.discovery.tcp.metricsstore.jdbc Contains JDBC implementation of metrics store. 
org.gridgain.grid.spi.discovery.tcp.metricsstore.s3 Contains Amazon S3 implementation of metrics store. 
org.gridgain.grid.spi.discovery.tcp.metricsstore.sharedfs Contains shared file system based implementation of metrics store. 
org.gridgain.grid.spi.discovery.tcp.metricsstore.vm Contains local VM metrics store implementation. 
org.gridgain.grid.spi.eventstorage Contains APIs for event storage SPI. 
org.gridgain.grid.spi.eventstorage.memory Contains default in-memory implementation for event storage SPI. 
org.gridgain.grid.spi.failover Contains APIs for failover SPI. 
org.gridgain.grid.spi.failover.always Contains default "always" failover SPI. 
org.gridgain.grid.spi.failover.jobstealing Contains job stealing failover SPI. 
org.gridgain.grid.spi.failover.never Contains "never" failover SPI. 
org.gridgain.grid.spi.loadbalancing Contains APIs for load balancing SPI. 
org.gridgain.grid.spi.loadbalancing.adaptive Contains adaptive load balancing SPI. 
org.gridgain.grid.spi.loadbalancing.roundrobin Contains default round-robin implementation for load balancing SPI. 
org.gridgain.grid.spi.loadbalancing.weightedrandom Contains weighted random-base implementation for load balancing SPI. 
org.gridgain.grid.spi.topology Contains APIs for topology SPI. 
org.gridgain.grid.spi.topology.attributes Contains attributes based topology SPI implementation. 
org.gridgain.grid.spi.topology.basic Contains default basic topology SPI implementation. 
org.gridgain.grid.spi.topology.nodefilter Contains topology SPI implementation based on filtering node metrics. 
org.gridgain.grid.test Contains common classes for JUnit integration. 
org.gridgain.grid.thread Contains threads-related utility classes. 
org.gridgain.grid.typedef Contains typedefs definitions for frequently used classes. 
 

Classes in org.gridgain.grid used by org.gridgain.grid
Grid
          Start Here  Main In-Memory Compute Grid APIs.
GridClosureCallMode
          Distribution modes for one or more closures executed via Grid.call(...) methods.
GridConfiguration
          This interface defines grid runtime configuration.
GridDataLoader
          Data loader is responsible for loading external data into cache.
GridDeploymentMode
          Grid deployment mode.
GridEmptyProjectionException
          This exception defines illegal call on empty projection.
GridEnterpriseLicense
          GridGain Enterprise license descriptor.
GridEvent
          Grid events are used for notification about what happens within the grid.
GridException
          General grid exception.
GridFactoryListener
          Listener for gird state change notifications.
GridFactoryState
          Possible states of GridFactory.
GridFuture
          Extension for standard Future interface.
GridInterruptedException
          This exception is used to wrap standard InterruptedException into GridException.
GridJob
          Defines executable unit for GridTask.
GridJobAdapterEx
          Convenience adapter for GridJob implementations.
GridJobContext
          Context attached to every job executed on the grid.
GridJobContinuation
          Defines continuation support for grid job context.
GridJobResult
          Result of remote job which gets passed into GridTask.result(GridJobResult, List) method.
GridJobResultPolicy
          This enumeration provides different types of actions following the last received job result.
GridJobSibling
          Job sibling interface defines a job from the same split.
GridLicenseException
          This exception is thrown when license violation is detected.
GridLifecycleBean
          A bean that reacts to grid lifecycle events defined in GridLifecycleEventType.
GridLifecycleEventType
          Grid lifecycle event types.
GridLocalEventListener
          Listener for asynchronous local node grid events.
GridMessageListener
          Deprecated. 
GridMetadataAware
          Allows to attach metadata attributes to any entity that implements this interface.
GridNode
          Interface representing a single grid node.
GridNodeLocal
          Defines interface for node-local storage.
GridNodeMetrics
          This class represents runtime information on a node.
GridPeerDeployAware
          Represents any class that needs to maintain or carry on peer deployment information.
GridProjection
          Defines grid projection interface and monadic set of operations on a set of grid nodes.
GridProjectionMetrics
          This interface defines cumulative metrics for the projection.
GridRichNode
          Defines a "rich" node as a single node-based grid projection.
GridScheduleFuture
          Future for cron-based scheduled execution.
GridTask
          Grid task interface defines a task that can be executed on the grid.
GridTaskAdapter
          Convenience adapter for GridTask interface.
GridTaskFuture
          This class defines a handler for asynchronous task execution.
GridTaskListener
          Deprecated. 
GridTaskSession
          Defines a distributed session for particular task execution.
GridTaskSessionAttributeListener
          This interface defines listener for task session attributes.
GridTaskSessionScope
          Defines life-time scopes for checkpoint operations.
GridTaskSplitAdapter
          This class defines simplified adapter for GridTask.
